author: cmpilato
msg: Fix a cvs2svn bug involving deletions as initial branch actions.
(Commit.commit): fill branches needed in the delete case, too.  We
don't want our deletions to be no-ops *and* our branches to remain
unfilled.  This could result in the branch being finished again
later without the deletion of the file from the branch ever
New test data for our new test.
